name: The Tuna Tile - Obtain an 'afkable' pet.
description: King Black Dragon, Callisto/Artio, Heron, Rock Goblem, Beaver, Abyssal Protector, Sarachia, Scurry. If you can argue to me that it is afkable, I will allow it.

name: Obtain a boss pet with a drop rate of 1/4000 or more
description: Includes: DKS, Corp, GWD bosses (except Nex), WT, Temp, Zulrah

name: Obtain Gilded or 3rd Age from a clue casket
Obtain a skilling pet
description: Players with 200m xp in a skill are not eligible for this tile.

name: Obtain a Dragonic visage of any kind
Obtain one of the following: Mutagen (Zulrah), Dragon Axe (WT), Dragon Harpoon (Temp), Dark Totem (Skotizo)
Obtain an Eternal Gem or Imbued Heart
